summary: This document is a compilation of law enforcement database queries and reports generated on June 6, 2019, likely as part of an investigation. It includes a U.S. Customs and Border Protection (CBP) travel encounter list for an individual, a New York State DMV photo request, a Facebook page screenshot, and a comprehensive background report from TLOxp. The subject's name and other personal identifiers are redacted throughout.

events.title: Outbound Flight from JFK
events.description: The subject of the CBP query had an outbound encounter at John F. Kennedy International Airport (JFK) on a TK (Turkish Airlines) flight, status 'ON BOARD'.

events.title: DMV Photo Request and Background Check
events.description: On June 6, 2019, a DMV photo was requested via the eJusticeNY portal and a comprehensive background report was generated via TLOxp for an investigation subject.

locations: JFK - JOHN F KENNEDY INTL (New York)
keyFacts: The subject of the investigation is heavily redacted; no name, date of birth, or SSN is visible in the provided text.

CBP records show the subject traveled internationally multiple times between 2010 and 2015, with flights departing from and arriving at major global hubs including JFK, Newark, Miami, Rome, Sao Paulo, and Tel Aviv.
A background check (TLOxp) on June 6, 2019, found the subject had a judgment filed against them by 'CAPITAL ONE' and listed an address in Astoria, Queens, New York.
Investigators accessed the subject's DMV photo and a Facebook page on June 6, 2019, as part of the inquiry.

The document demonstrates coordinated investigative efforts between Customs and Border Protection (travel history), state justice portals (DMV photo), and commercial background check services (TLOxp).
